Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police actiivty. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police actiivty.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Whipple
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Kedzie, Montrose, California and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Whipple.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Kedzie, Montrose, California and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Whipple.

Allow extra travel time.
